headline: Media Attention Fades, but Their Well Water Is Still Foul
sentences: The state’s criminal case against the driller dates to 2020, when Attorney General Josh Shapiro—a Democrat now running for governor—charged Cabot with violating the law by allowing methane from the company’s faulty gas wells to escape into drinking-water aquifers in Dimock and nearby communities.
